body:
### Welcome to Copter.
* [Arduino](http://arduino.cc)

### How to update this page
```
$ cd your_repo_root/copter
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Related Stuffs
  1. [MultiWii is a general purpose software to control a multirotor RC model](http://www.multiwii.com)
  2. Some projects on Github
     * [copterpilot](https://github.com/sebastianherp/copterpilot/tree/master/MultiWii) by @sebastianherp
     * [QuadCopter](https://github.com/hagleitn/QuadCopter) by @hagleitn
  3. Demos
     * [Aeroquad](http://aeroquad.com/content.php?s=cceccfcd65cf192ecef9cb53bec063c9)
     * [Project-3](http://robots.dacloughb.com/project-3/)
name: Copter
